ValidationRule.description: Prevent the Interview Completed field from being updated multiple times.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Interview_Completed__c), ( PRIORVALUE(Interview_Completed__c) = True ), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 3"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Advisor 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Advisor 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Advisor Team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot uncheck the 'Interview Completed' field.
